body_html:
@jhseu windows.h is included in a lot of places, trying to track down all these files and #undef OPAQUE right after windows.h can be difficult. If a new file includes windows.h and forgot to undef macros again, it will break again.

windows.h is known as one of the most namespace/macro polluting header file for a reason.
body_text:
@jhseu windows.h is included in a lot of places, trying to track down all these files and #undef OPAQUE right after windows.h can be difficult. If a new file includes windows.h and forgot to undef macros again, it will break again.
windows.h is known as one of the most namespace/macro polluting header file for a reason.
body:
@jhseu `windows.h` is included in a lot of places, trying to track down all these files and `#undef OPAQUE` right after `windows.h` can be difficult. If a new file includes `windows.h` and forgot to undef macros again, it will break again.

`windows.h` is known as one of the most namespace/macro polluting header file for a reason.
